Package org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

Class HorizontalBarOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.ConfigurationOptions
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.ScalesOptions
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.BarOptions
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.HorizontalBarOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasAnimation, ConfigurationElement, AddHandlerEventHandler, EventHandler, RemoveHandlerEventHandler
    public class HorizontalBarOptions
extends BarOptions
    Specific options for HORIZONTAL BAR chart. It contains all properties for this kind of chart.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Constructor Summary

      HorizontalBarOptions​(IsChart chart, IsDefaultScaledOptions defaultValues)
      Builds the object storing the chart instance and default values.

      void merge​(NativeObjectContainer source, String property)
      Merge a native object in the this one with a specific property name.
      This is used by plugins implementation (native java script ones) when they are not using the standard way to add plugin configuration in the options of chart.

      void setIndexAxis​(IndexAxis indexAxis)

      Use IndexAxis.Y for horizontal bar.

      • merge

        public final void merge​(NativeObjectContainer source,
                        String property)
        Merge a native object in the this one with a specific property name.
        This is used by plugins implementation (native java script ones) when they are not using the standard way to add plugin configuration in the options of chart.
        Parameters:
        source - native object container to add
        property - property name
